Carga data: 

```{r}
load("data_final.Rda")
```

```{r}
id=read.csv("ID MAPAS.csv")
```

```{r}
data_final$TXUBIGEO = as.factor(data_final$TXUBIGEO)
str(data_final$TXUBIGEO)
```

```{r}
id$TXUBIGEO=ifelse(nchar(id$TXUBIGEO)==5, paste0(0,id$TXUBIGEO),id$TXUBIGEO)
```

```{r}
id$TXUBIGEO= as.factor(id$TXUBIGEO)
str(id$TXUBIGEO)
```

```{r}
data=left_join(id[c(4:5)], data_final)
```

```{r}
library(maptools)  
library(rgeos)
library(rgdal)
library(sf)
distritosPeru=readShapePoly("DISTRITO_16_03_2015.shp")
```

```{r}
distritosPeru  <- merge(distritosPeru, data, by="ID") 
```

```{r}
writeSpatialShape(distritosPeru, "DISTRITO_16_03_2015")
```
